address.address_not_recognized_heading: We did not recognize your address
address.confirm_address_text: We could not find a match for the address you entered. Please confirm the address.

billing.save_billing_address_error: An error occurred while saving the billing address to your price quote. Please try again.
billing.billing_address_amazon: Same as the Billing address set by you in your Amazon account.
billing.use_shipping_address_label: My Billing address is the same as my Shipping address

cart.billed_amount_text: *You will be charged and invoiced {total} ({code}) for this order.
cart.empty_cart_message: Your cart is empty, you are being redirected. Please click here if your browser does not redirect you.

common.leave_warning: Are you sure you want to leave? Data you have entered may not be saved.
common.unavailable_error: Checkout is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
common.unstable_network_error: It looks like the server is taking too long to respond, this can be caused by either poor connectivity or an error with our servers. Please try again in a while.
common.order_loading_error: There was an error loading your order. Please try again.
common.order_fatal_error_heading: There was an error placing your order
common.order_fatal_error_extra: Please choose another payment method or contact us for further assistance.

customer.checkout_as_guest_text: Checking out as a Guest? You'll be able to save your details to create an account with us later.
customer.create_account_error: An error occurred while creating your account. Please try again.
customer.create_account_text: Create an account for a faster checkout in the future
customer.create_account_to_continue_text: Don’t have an account? Create an account to continue.
customer.password_letter_required_error: Password needs to contain a letter
customer.password_number_required_error: Password needs to contain a number
customer.reset_password_before_login_error: Thank you, you will receive an e-mail in the next 5 minutes with instructions for resetting your password. If you don't receive this e-mail, please check your junk mail folder or contact us for further assistance.
customer.sign_in_error: The email or password you entered is not valid.
customer.sign_in_throttled_error: Due to excessive login attempts, please wait 10 seconds before attempting to log in again.
customer.sign_out_error: An error occurred while signing out. Please try again.
customer.subscribe_to_newsletter_text: Yes, I'd like to receive updates.

embedded_checkout.unsupported_error: The following payment methods are not supported by Embedded Checkout: {methods}. Please contact us for assistance.

payment.affirm_body_text: You will be redirected to Affirm to securely complete your purchase. Just fill out a few pieces of basic information and get a real-time decision. Checking your eligibility won't affect your credit score.
payment.credit_card_cvv_help_text: For VISA and Mastercard, the CVV is a three-digit code printed on the back. For American Express it is the four-digit code printed on the front. The CVV is a security measure to ensure that you are in possession of the card.
payment.credit_card_expiration_invalid_error: Expiration date must be a valid future date in MM / YY format
payment.credit_card_number_invalid_error: Credit Card Number must be valid
payment.credit_card_number_last_four: Enter card number for {cardType} ending in {lastFour}
payment.credit_card_number_mismatch_error: The card number entered does not match the card stored in your account
payment.payment_error: An error occurred while processing your payment. Please try again.
payment.payment_method_disabled_error: The selected payment method is no longer valid. Click OK to see the most up-to-date payment methods.
payment.payment_method_invalid_error: There's a problem processing your payment. Please contact us for assistance or choose another payment method.
payment.payment_method_unavailable_error: This payment provider is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
payment.payment_not_required_text: Payment is not required for this order.
payment.place_order_error: There was an error placing your order. Please contact us.
payment.instrument_manage_modal_confirmation_lab: Are you sure you want to delete this stored payment method?
payment.instrument_manage_modal_empty_text: You do not have any stored payment methods.
payment.instrument_manage_delete_server_error: There was an error when attempting to delete that stored payment method, please try again.
payment.instrument_manage_delete_auth_error: There was a problem authorizing your request. Please try signing in again
payment.instrument_manage_delete_client_error: There was an error when attempting to delete the stored payment method: payment method no longer exists or cannot be deleted.
payment.instrument_save_payment_method_label: Save this card for future transactions
payment.account_instrument_save_payment_method_l: Save this account for future transactions
payment.account_instrument_new_shipping_address:
We noticed this is a new shipping address.

For security reasons, you will need to re-link your PayPal account when shipping to an address for the first time or if the shipping address was edited recently.
payment.instrument_trusted_shipping_address_text: This additional security step is applied to your card when shipping to an address for the first time or if the shipping address was edited recently.
payment.instrument_trusted_shipping_address_titl: Please re-enter your card number to authorize this transaction.

redeemable.code_invalid_error: The gift certificate or coupon code is invalid
redeemable.code_required_error: Please enter a gift certificate or coupon code
redeemable.coupon_location_error: Your shipping address doesn't meet the location requirements for the coupon code you entered.
redeemable.coupon_min_order_total: Your order does not meet the minimum total for this coupon code to be applied.
redeemable.store_credit_available_text: Your account currently has {storeCredit} total store credit available

remote.browser_unsupported: The selected payment method requires a different web browser. Please choose another payment method.
remote.connection_error: Connection to remote checkout refused, please try later.
remote.payment_method_error: There was an error retrieving your remote payment method. Please try again.
remote.session_error: Your remote session has expired. Please log in again.
remote.shipping_address_error: There was an error retrieving your remote shipping address. Please try again.
remote.sign_in_required_error: Remote sign in required before payment

shipping.cart_change_error: An update to your shopping cart has been detected and your available shipping costs have been updated. Please re-select a shipping method to continue.
shipping.enter_shipping_address_text: Please enter a shipping address in order to see shipping quotes
shipping.assign_item_error: An error occurred while assigning item to address. Please try again
shipping.assign_item_invalid_address_error: The selected address is not valid. Please go to your account page and update it.
shipping.unassign_item_error: An error occurred while unassigning item to address.
shipping.save_shipping_address_error: An error occurred while saving the shipping address to your price quote. Please try again.
shipping.save_shipping_option_error: An error occurred while saving the shipping quote to your order. Please try again.
shipping.select_shipping_address_text: Please select a shipping address in order to see shipping quotes
shipping.multishipping_address_heading: Choose where to ship each item
shipping.multishipping_guest_intro: To ship your items to multiple addresses you need to
shipping.multishipping_guest_create: or create an account prior to proceeding.
shipping.shipping_option_expired_error: The shipping price you were quoted is no longer valid. Click OK to see the most up-to-date shipping prices.
shipping.shipping_option_expired_heading: Your shipping price has been updated

social.share_heading: Tell your friends about your purchase!

spam_protection.verify_action: Please click here to verify yourself as human before proceeding.

terms_and_conditions.agreement_required_error: Please agree to the terms and conditions
terms_and_conditions.agreement_text: Yes, I agree with the above terms and conditions
terms_and_conditions.agreement_with_link_text: Yes, I agree with the terms and conditions

order_confirmation.order_pending_review_text: Your order was sent to us but is currently awaiting payment. Once we receive the payment for your order, it will be completed. If you've already provided payment details then we will process your order manually and send you an email when it's completed.
order_confirmation.order_with_downloadable_digital_items_te: You can download your digital purchases by clicking the links on this page, or by logging into your account at any time. There is also a download link in your confirmation email, which should be arriving shortly.
order_confirmation.order_with_support_number_text: An email will be sent containing information about your purchase. If you have any questions about your purchase, email us at {supportEmail} or call us at {supportPhoneNumber}.
order_confirmation.order_without_downloadable_digital_items: Once we receive your payment, we’ll send a confirmation email with a link to download your digital purchases.
order_confirmation.order_without_support_number_text: An email will be sent containing information about your purchase. If you have any questions about your purchase, email us at {supportEmail}.
order_confirmation.order_status_update_facebook_messenger_h: Get instant updates of your order to Messenger
